name: Between Darkness
description:
The First Game Of Computer Game Studios (A.k.a: CGS).

=============================================================

Escape from The Maze, The Grim Reaper Dungeon, The Unknown Asylum. Survive From The Zombies and Complete Your Escape in the 30 Doors & The Pagan Ritual!

=============================================================

Created By: Computer Game Studios

Developed By: Bendy Infected

Menu Composer: IsaacGO22

Game Engine: Terror Engine: Reborn

=============================================================

Special Thanks To:

-Zeoworks: For Creating Terror Engine, an Awesome Engine!

-IsaacGO22: For Creating The Menu Music!

-Luciano Cleva (Lucio): For Creating The Announcement Trailer (In Minecraft Style, Of Course)!

-You: Thanks For Playing Our Game!
